mapper.select: WITH waitView AS ( SELECT RCP_NO, MAX(WAIT_NUM) AS WAIT_NUM FROM V_WAIT_HIST GROUP BY RCP_NO ) SELECT C.TRM_CD, A.RCP_NO, A.WAIT_NUM, A.PA_NO, A.PA_NAME, A.DIV_CD, A.DIV_NM, A.WAITST_CD, A.WAITST_NM, TO_CHAR(A.WAIT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS WAIT_DT, D.FILM_CD FROM V_WAIT_HIST A INNER JOIN waitView B ON(A.RCP_NO = B.RCP_NO AND A.WAIT_NUM = B.WAIT_NUM) INNER JOIN TRM_CHART C ON(B.RCP_NO = C.RCP_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN FILM_ORDER D ON(C.TRM_CD = D.TRM_CD) WHERE A.WAITST_CD = 'WS005' AND D.FILM_CD = 'X-RAY' ORDER BY 1
